oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women; Handicraft; Quilting; Quilts; Sewing
Page, Nancy Scarbrough, 1874-1964. Quiltmakers - Tennessee. -- Quilting - Tennessee. -- Quilts - Tennessee - Cumberland County. -- Quilts.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mrs. Nancy Page, a quiltmaker near Crossville, stands beside a quilt frame as she arranges her cotton batting.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee Department of Conservation Photograph Collection, 1937-1976
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Nancy Page was the widow of Robert Lee Page, who died on March 26, 1918. They married in White County on August 1, 1892, and had four children: William Alexander, Hobert, Veda, and Helen Roberta.
